citation: Water Miscellaneous Amendments (Delegation and Industrial Water Supply) Act 2023 (Tas)
text:
Water Miscellaneous Amendments (Delegation and Industrial Water Supply) Act 2023

An Act to amend the Irrigation Clauses Act 1973, the Irrigation Company Act 2011 and the Water Management Act 1999
[Royal Assent 11 December 2023]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Water Miscellaneous Amendments (Delegation and Industrial Water Supply) Act 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

PART 2 - Irrigation Clauses Act 1973 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Irrigation Clauses Act 1973 .

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Irrigation Clauses Act 1973 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Irrigation Clauses Act 1973 .

12.

13.

22.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Water Management Act 1999 .

PART 5 - Miscellaneous

23. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which this Act received the Royal Assent.
